resources.string: This app would like to use Google Firebase Analytics to understand your interactions with the app.\n\nThis involves using cookies and similar technologies and sharing your personal data with Google.
This app would like to use the Facebok SDK to understand your interactions with the app.\n\nThis involves using cookies and similar technologies and sharing your personal data with Facebook/Meta.
This app would like to use Applovin to serve you ads.\n\nThis involves using cookies and similar technologies and sharing your personal data with third-party companies.
This app would like to access the Google Advertising Identifier.\n\nThis involves accessing an identifier that can track your activity across apps.
